column4: may i have little help please? dont matter what im trying to install iim getting error :"E: Unable to locate package..."
may i have little help please? dont matter what im trying to install iim getting error :"E: Unable to locate package..."
im just trying in terminal
im trying install flashplugin-nonfree
try refreshing your package list
and make sure its not locked
apt-get update
to refresh.
you using sudo?
um, you don't have another package manager open right?
what package are you trying to install again?
did you add the restricted packages to your list?
its not in the default list
ok, go to your package manager and check the rest of the repos. Its in one of those.
I haven't used gnome in forever, so I don't know what package maanger it uses anymore
you are trying to get flash correct? I believe its included in chrome automatically.
yeah, its there. Adobe Flash plugin
if you enable those other package locations and search for flash, you will see it.
unfortunately, I gotta go. Hopefully you figure it out! If not, I am sure someone else can help
umm, yeah, its under "settings" in whatever your package manager is
should be a bunch of check boxes under sources or something like that.
look around
